channel.title: A little help adding customs
channel.description: Ok well, I have done a decent bit, the only things I need help with now is > if it has a special how would i add it(idk if it comes with one) and how do I add the animation for it? Ok so far I have : -Added into models(client sided) -Added into Class8.java(Client sided) -Went into game and put "add model (number) -Given the weapon to myself. -Edited weapon stats(server sided) So far it is all workin out great, it has its name and all, stats, etc. However when I go to hit, I want it to have the animation of a whip, as its a dragon whip. Instead the weapon disappears for the attack, the character holds their right hand back and then swings forward doin damage. How can I fix this? (also if you know, reply to adding special attacks) (and of course yes, I have compiled everything..) Thanks :D

item.title: A little help adding customs
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Edit the animation in the Attack method.

Read full topic

item.title: A little help adding customs
item.dc:creator: @99range_k0 99range k0
item.description:
@99range_k0 wrote:

Ok well, I have done a decent bit, the only things I need help with now is > if it has a special how would i add it(idk if it comes with one) and how do I add the animation for it?
Ok so far I have :
-Added into models(client sided)
-Added into Class8.java(Client sided)
-Went into game and put "add model (number)
-Given the weapon to myself.
-Edited weapon stats(server sided)
So far it is all workin out great, it has its name and all, stats, etc. However when I go to hit, I want it to have the animation of a whip, as its a dragon whip. Instead the weapon disappears for the attack, the character holds their right hand back and then swings forward doin damage. How can I fix this?
(also if you know, reply to adding special attacks)
(and of course yes, I have compiled everythingâ€¦)
Thanks

Read full topic
